mapper.select: select brand.brand_id,brand_name,count_sum from brand,(select count(brand_id) as count_sum,brand_id from product_category group by brand_id) as pc where brand.brand_id=pc.brand_id;

select robot_category.robot_id,robot_name,count_sum from robot_category,(select count(robot_id) as count_sum,robot_id from product_robot group by robot_id) as pr where robot_category.robot_id=pr.robot_id;
select parts.parts_id,parts_name,count_sum from parts,(select count(parts_id) as count_sum,parts_id from product_category group by parts_id) as pc where parts.parts_id=pc.parts_id;

select industry.industry_id,industry_name,count_sum from industry,(select count(industry_id) as count_sum,industry_id from product_category group by industry_id) as pc where industry.industry_id=pc.industry_id;
